row.name: Cosmic Energy
row.rules: Willpower. This character has SAFEGUARD: Outwit. Uncopyable.

row.name: Mystics
row.rules: Each time this character takes damage from an opposing character's attack, after resolutions deal the attacker 1 penetrating damage. Uncopyable.

row.name: Police
row.rules: When an adjacent friendly character makes a range attack, modify the target’s defense -1 if the target is within line of fire of this character.

row.name: Snowfall
row.rules: FREE: Choose a team ability that a friendly character can use (that isn’t Uncopyable). This character can use the chosen team ability until you choose again. Uncopyable.

row.name: Team Player
row.rules: FREE: Choose a team ability that a friendly character can use (that isn’t Uncopyable). This character can use the chosen team ability until you choose again. Uncopyable.

row.name: Underworld
row.rules: Passenger:1, but only to carry a character that shares a keyword. Passenger:2, but only to carry characters that share a keyword (with this character) and are lower points.

row.name: Avengers
row.rules: When this character is given a MOVE action, modify speed +1.

row.name: Avengers Initiative
row.rules: Improved Targeting Hindering

row.name: Brotherhood of Mutants
row.rules: When this character hits an opposing character with an attack roll of [10-12], after resolutions remove an action token from this character.

row.name: Defenders
row.rules: When this character is attacked, you may replace its defense value with the printed defense value of an adjacent friendly character that can use this team ability.

row.name: Fantastic Four
row.rules: When this character is KO'd, after resolutions each other friendly character using this team ability heals 1 click.

row.name: Guardians
row.rules: This character’s combat values can’t be modified by opposing characters’ effects.

row.name: Hydra
row.rules: When an adjacent friendly character makes a range attack, modify the target’s defense -1 if the target is within line of fire of this character.

row.name: Masters of Evil
row.rules: When an adjacent friendly character makes a close attack, modify the target’s defense -1 if the target is adjacent to this character.

row.name: Minions of Doom
row.rules: When this character KO's a standard opposing character, after resolutions heal 1 click on a friendly character using this team ability.

row.name: Power Cosmic
row.rules: Willpower. This character has SAFEGUARD: Outwit. Uncopyable.

row.name: Sinister Syndicate
row.rules: When this character makes an attack, you may replace its attack value with the printed attack value of an adjacent friendly character that can use this team ability.

row.name: Skrulls
row.rules: Shape Change, but only succeeds on a D6. If the character can already use Shape Change, instead increase the result of its roll for Shape Change by +1.

row.name: Spider-Man
row.rules: FREE: Choose a team ability that a friendly character can use (that isn’t Uncopyable). This character can use the chosen team ability until you choose again. Uncopyable.

row.name: S.H.I.E.L.D.
row.rules: Adjacent friendly characters modify range +1. POWER: Choose an adjacent friendly character. Once this turn, the chosen character modifies its damage +1 when making a range attack.

row.name: Ultimates
row.rules: Improved Targeting Hindering

row.name: X-Men
row.rules: POWER: Choose an adjacent friendly character that can use this team ability and heal that character 1 click and roll a d6. [D1-D4]: This character is dealt 1 unavoidable damage.

row.name: Batman Ally
row.rules: Stealth.

row.name: Batman Enemy
row.rules: When this character makes an attack, you may replace its attack value with the printed attack value of an adjacent friendly character that can use this team ability.

row.name: Calculator
row.rules: FREE: Choose a team ability that a friendly character can use (that isn’t Uncopyable). This character can use the chosen team ability until you choose again. Uncopyable.

row.name: Green Lantern Corps
row.rules: Passenger:8

row.name: Hypertime
row.rules: When an opposing character that can't use this team ability attempts to move from a non-adjacent square into a square that is adjacent to this character, it must roll a d6. [D1-D2]: The opposing character can't move into any square adjacent to this character this turn. Uncopyable.

row.name: Injustice League
row.rules: When this character hits an opposing character with an attack roll of [10-12], after resolutions remove an action token from this character.

row.name: Justice League
row.rules: When this character is given a MOVE action, modify speed +1.

row.name: Justice Society
row.rules: When this character is attacked, you may replace its defense value with the printed defense value of an adjacent friendly character that can use this team ability.

row.name: Kingdom Come
row.rules: When this character would be hit by a range attack, if the attacker doesn’t have [Kingdom Come Team Ability Symbol], you may roll a d6. [D5-D6]: Evade. Uncopyable.

row.name: Legion of Super Heroes
row.rules: FREE: Choose a team ability that a friendly character can use (that isn’t Uncopyable). This character can use the chosen team ability until you choose again. Uncopyable.

row.name: Outsiders
row.rules: FREE: Choose a character (including itself) within 6 squares and line of fire. Until your next turn, the chosen character’s combat values can’t be modified. Uncopyable.

row.name: Quintessence
row.rules: Willpower. This character has SAFEGUARD: Outwit. Uncopyable.

row.name: Suicide Squad
row.rules: When an adjacent friendly character is KO’d, after resolutions, you may roll a d6. If you do, heal this character equal to the result -2, minimum 1.

row.name: Superman Ally
row.rules: Improved Targeting Hindering

row.name: Superman Enemy
row.rules: FREE: If this character is adjacent to a friendly character of lower points that can use this team ability, it can use Outwit until your next turn.

row.name: Titans
row.rules: POWER: Choose an adjacent friendly character that can use this team ability and heal that character 1 click and roll a d6. [D1-D4]: This character is dealt 1 unavoidable damage.

row.name: Wonder Woman Ally
row.rules: Super Senses, but only succeeds on a D6 . If the character can already use Super Senses, instead increase the result of its roll for Super Senses by +1.

row.name: Borg
row.rules: When an adjacent friendly character is KO’d, after resolutions, you may roll a d6. If you do, heal this character equal to the result -2, minimum 1.

row.name: Cardassian Union
row.rules: At the beginning of the game, you may choose a team ability. This character modifies attack +1 when attacking only characters with the chosen team ability.

row.name: United Federation of Planets
row.rules: When this character is given a MOVE action, modify speed +1.

row.name: Ferengi Alliance
row.rules: Shape Change, but this use only succeeds on a D6.

row.name: Klingon Empire
row.rules: When this character hits an opposing character with an attack roll of 10-12, after resolutions remove an action token from this character.

row.name: Mirror Universe
row.rules: Each time this character takes damage from an opposing character's attack, after resolutions deal the attacker 1 penetrating damage. Uncopyable.

row.name: Q Continuum
row.rules: Willpower. This character has SAFEGUARD: Outwit. Uncopyable.

row.name: Romulan Star Empire
row.rules: Stealth.
